name: zombie match defense
description:
Match-3 mechanics meet lane defense in Zombie Match Defense.

• 5 / 5 - AppAdvice
• 4 / 5 - Apple'N'Apps
• Winner of Pocket Gamer's Very Big Indie Pitch

A cool concoction of lane-based defense and match-3 puzzle, this cerebral puzzle game is as fresh as the grey matter the undead crave. Four different kinds of zombies come in waves, hopping from brain to delicious brain. Your scientists are the only thing blocking their escape and the end of the world as we know it. Match brains vertically or horizontally to eliminate the monsters feeding on them. Rack up combos and you'll get items you can use to give you the edge.

There are four different areas infested with the spooky creeps, each with its own signature type of zombie to battle. Clear the stages to earn Zombucks you can use to unlock special items at the helpful ice cream truck. Challenge the unlockable Endless mode to see how long you can hold out against the full weight of the undead invasion. Collect all of the different scientists, and try your luck at the tough-as-nails Hard mode. In Zombie Match Defense, you either use your brains or lose them!

- Bizarre Enemies: Four different kinds of zombies are here, and they're hungry!

- Easy to Play: Match the brains in a row or column and send the zombies packing!

- Sweet Power-Ups: Unlock and use the Brain Freeze, the Crane, the Shotgun, and more!

- Endless Zombies: Challenge the Endless mode for the ultimate zombie rush!

- Hard Mode: Can you defeat these ultra-difficult stages?

Zombie Match Defense is one of the many fantastic games brought back to life by GameClub, fully updated to support the latest versions of iOS and newest devices.
